title: George Rogers Clark National Historical Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             Park News         George Rogers Clark Memorial National Park Service  George Rogers Clark National Historical Park strives to keep the public informed about news events which occur within the park by providing press releases to local and regional news providers, and by posting current news releases on this web site.                 Facebook "Like" George Rogers Clark National Historical Park on Facebook to get the first look at upcoming events and programs. Post your favorite photos, share your park stories, and learn about our history, natural resources, and more- "Like" us today!         Twitter Follow @GeorgeRClarkNPS on Twitter and receive updates on breaking news in the park, social events, and "what is happening now."
